text: The cycling competition at the 2014 Central American and Caribbean Games was held in Veracruz, Mexico. The road cycling tournament was scheduled to be held on 16 and 23 November on the Xalapa-Coatepec Route. The track cycling tournament was scheduled to be held from 17–21 November at the Velodrome in Xalapa. The mountain cycling tournament was scheduled to be held on 15 November at the Coatepec Mountain Circuit. The bmx cycling tournament was scheduled to be held on 22 November at Natura park. ==Medal summary== ===Road events=== {| |- | style="white-space: nowrap;" | Men's road race | | | |- |
